description: Dark-haired beefcake Damien Stone is minding his own business, smoking out behind what he thinks is an empty loading dock. Redheaded stock boy Troy Thomas spots Damien and impulsively decides that he wants the leather-clad stud then and there. Troy takes Damien into a back room and begs him to pound his ass hard and deep. Damien is eager to oblige, giving the twink the hot and rough quickie he needs.
title: Quick And Dirty
